theStormbringer:RazorWindToken.NAME: Razor Wind
theStormbringer:RazorWindToken.DESCRIPTION: thestormbringer:Foretold NL Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Return *Brewing *Storm to the discard pile.

theStormbringer:Sawitcoming.NAME: Forewarn
theStormbringer:Sawitcoming.DESCRIPTION: thestormbringer:Foretell NL Scry !M!. NL if an enemy intends to attack Gain !B! Block.

theStormbringer:SawitcomingToken.NAME: Saw It Coming
theStormbringer:SawitcomingToken.DESCRIPTION: thestormbringer:Foretold NL Scry !M! NL gain !B! Block. NL Return *Forewarn to your discard pile.

theStormbringer:Psybeam.NAME: Psybeam
theStormbringer:Psybeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL thestormbringer:Suspend a card in your discard pile for !M! turns.

theStormbringer:Ripple.NAME: Ripple Effect
theStormbringer:Ripple.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL thestormbringer:Suspend a card in your hand until you play *Ripple *Effect.

theStormbringer:ThreadsofFate.NAME: Threads of Fate
theStormbringer:ThreadsofFate.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of !M! thestormbringer:Fate cards to put on top of your draw pile. NL Scry !M!

theStormbringer:TheGravedigger.NAME: The Gravedigger
theStormbringer:TheGravedigger.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! random cards from your discard pile to your hand. NL thestormbringer:Thread : gain Vigor equal to the size of your discard pile.

theStormbringer:Fateshift.NAME: Fateshift
theStormbringer:Fateshift.DESCRIPTION: All enemies lose HP equal to twice their thestormbringer:Destiny_Knot

theStormbringer:OblivionForm.NAME: Omen Form
theStormbringer:OblivionForm.DESCRIPTION: When a non-Status card is Exhausted add an Ethereal copy of it to your hand.
